## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Process Time:|200 millisols|
|Work Time:|10 millisols|
|Power Required:|0.01 kW/hr|
|Start On:|false|

## Inputs
| Name      | Input Rate (kg/sol) | Minimum kg | Ambient |
|--------:|:------|-----:|:----|
|[Methane](/docs/definitions/resource/methane)|160.0|0.008|false|
|[Water](/docs/definitions/resource/water)|360.0|0.018|false|

Ambient inputs are consumed from the environment.

## Outputs
| Name      | Output Rate (kg/sol) | Waste Output |
|--------:|:------|-----:|:----|
|[Carbon dioxide](/docs/definitions/resource/carbon-dioxide)|440.0|false|

Waste outputs are released into the environment and do not need to be stored.
